card.name: Ajani Steadfast
card.property: +1: Until end of turn, up to one target creature gets +1/+1 and gains first strike, vigilance, and lifelink. −2: Put a +1/+1 counter on each creature you control and a loyalty counter on each other planeswalker you control. −7: You get an emblem with "If a source would deal damage to you or a planeswalker you control, prevent all but 1 of that damage."

card.name: Ajani's Pridemate
card.property: Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Ajani's Pridemate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When one of us prospers, the pride prospers." —Jazal Goldmane

card.name: Avacyn, Guardian Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance {1}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to another target creature this turn by sources of the color of your choice. {5}{W}{W}: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to target player or planeswalker this turn by sources of the color of your choice.

card.name: Battle Mastery
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has double strike. (It deals both first-strike and regular combat damage.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Boom! Boom! Boots the size of oxcarts, then an axe like a falling sun. Elves scattered. Trees scattered. Even the hills ran for the hills!" —Clachan Tales

card.name: Boonweaver Giant
card.property: When Boonweaver Giant enters the battlefield, you may search your graveyard, hand, and/or library for an Aura card and put it onto the battlefield attached to Boonweaver Giant. If you search your library this way, shuffle it.

card.name: Congregate
card.property: Target player gains 2 life for each creature on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In the gathering there is strength for all who founder, renewal for all who languish, love for all who sing." —Song of All, canto 642

card.name: Constricting Sliver
card.property: Sliver creatures you control have "When this creature enters the battlefield, you may exile target creature an opponent controls until this creature leaves the battlefield."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Slivers are often seen toying with enemies they capture, not out of cruelty, but to fully learn their physical capabilities.

card.name: Dauntless River Marshal
card.property: Dauntless River Marshal gets +1/+1 as long as you control an Island. {3}{U}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Thieves and squid squirm the same way when you capture them."

card.name: Devouring Light
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Exile target attacking or blocking creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Even your shadow is too foul to tolerate."

card.name: Divine Favor
card.property: Enchant creature When Divine Favor enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life. Enchanted creature gets +1/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: With an armory of light, even the squire may champion her people.

card.name: Ephemeral Shields
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Target creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

card.name: First Response
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if you lost life last turn, create a 1/1 white Soldier creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There's never a good time for a disaster or an attack. That's why we're here." —Oren, militia captain

card.name: Geist of the Moors
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The battle is won. There's work to be done. / The Blessed Sleep must wait. / A fiend is about. It stalks the devout. / I'll save them from my fate."—"The Good Geist's Vow"

card.name: Heliod's Pilgrim
card.property: When Heliod's Pilgrim enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an Aura card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The blessings of Heliod are apparent for all to see.

card.name: Hushwing Gryff
card.property: Flash Flying Creatures entering the battlefield don't cause abilities to trigger.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An overwhelming sense of calm accompanies the gryffs that wheel above the roofs of Gavony.

card.name: Kinsbaile Skirmisher
card.property: When Kinsbaile Skirmisher enters the battlefield, target creature gets +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If a boggart even dares breathe near one of my kin, I'll know. And I'll not be happy."

card.name: Marked by Honor
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has vigilance. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Stand your post for duty. Stand your ground for honor.

card.name: Mass Calcify
card.property: Destroy all nonwhite creatures.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The dead serve as their own tombstones.

card.name: Meditation Puzzle
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) You gain 8 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Find your center, and you will find your way.

card.name: Midnight Guard
card.property: Whenever another creature enters the battlefield, untap Midnight Guard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When you're on watch, no noise is harmless and no shadow can be ignored." —Olgard of the Skiltfolk

card.name: Oppressive Rays
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't attack or block unless its controller pays {3}. Activated abilities of enchanted creature cost {3} more to activate.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Battle of Pharagax Bridge, the Champion spent many months among the leonin of Oreskos. She found that they were quick to take offense, not because they were thin-skinned, but because they were always eager for a fight. —The Theriad

card.name: Paragon of New Dawns
card.property: Other white creatures you control get +1/+1. {W}, {T}: Another target white creature you control gains vigilance until end of turn. (Attacking doesn't cause it to tap.)

card.name: Pillar of Light
card.property: Exile target creature with toughness 4 or greater.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The vaulted ceiling of our faith rests upon such pillars." —Darugand, banisher priest

card.name: Preeminent Captain
card.property: First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.) Whenever Preeminent Captain attacks, you may put a Soldier creature card from your hand onto the battlefield tapped and attacking.

card.name: Raise the Alarm
card.property: Create two 1/1 white Soldier creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like blinking or breathing, responding to an alarm is an involuntary reflex.

card.name: Razorfoot Griffin
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) First strike (This creature deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Like a meteor, it strikes from above without warning. Unlike a meteor, it then carries you off and eats you.

card.name: Resolute Archangel
card.property: Flying When Resolute Archangel enters the battlefield, if your life total is less than your starting life total, it becomes equal to your starting life total.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Cut it down, bury it in snow, put it to the torch. The rose will still bloom again.

card.name: Return to the Ranks
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Return X target creature cards with converted mana cost 2 or less from your graveyard to the battlefield.

card.name: Sanctified Charge
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn. White creatures you control also gain first strike until end of turn. (They deal combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: You need only raise your spear to receive this blessing.

card.name: Selfless Cathar
card.property: {1} {W}, Sacrifice Selfless Cathar: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If I fail to offer myself, we will surely be overrun. My fate would be the same."

card.name: Seraph of the Masses
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Flying Seraph of the Masses's power and toughness are each equal to the number of creatures you control.

card.name: Solemn Offering
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. You gain 4 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You will be reimbursed for your donation." "The reimbursement is spiritual." —Temple signs

card.name: Soul of Theros
card.property: Vigilance {4}{W}{W}: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain first strike and lifelink until end of turn. {4}{W}{W}, Exile Soul of Theros from your graveyard: Creatures you control get +2/+2 and gain first strike and lifelink until end of turn.

card.name: Soulmender
card.property: {T}: You gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Healing is more art than magic. Well, there is still quite a bit of magic."

card.name: Spectra Ward
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +2/+2 and has protection from all colors. This effect doesn't remove Auras. (It can't be blocked, targeted, or dealt damage by anything that's white, blue, black, red, or green.)

card.name: Spirit Bonds
card.property: Whenever a nontoken creature enters the battlefield under your control, you may pay {W}. If you do, create a 1/1 white Spirit creature token with flying. {1}{W}, Sacrifice a Spirit: Target non-Spirit creature gains indestructible until end of turn. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it.)

card.name: Sungrace Pegasus
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Lifelink (Damage dealt by this creature also causes you to gain that much life.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The sacred feathers of the pegasus are said to have healing powers.

card.name: Tireless Missionaries
card.property: When Tireless Missionaries enters the battlefield, you gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: If they succeed in their holy work, their order will vanish into welcome obscurity, for there will be no more souls to redeem.

card.name: Triplicate Spirits
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Create three 1/1 white Spirit creature tokens with flying. (They can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

card.name: Wall of Essence
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Wall of Essence is dealt combat damage, you gain that much life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If you cannot turn your enemy's strength to weakness, then make that strength your own." —Gresha, warrior sage

card.name: Warden of the Beyond
card.property: Vigilance (Attacking doesn't cause this creature to tap.) Warden of the Beyond gets +2/+2 as long as an opponent owns a card in exile.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He draws strength from a vast source few mortals can fathom. Designed by Isaiah Cartwright

card.name: Aeronaut Tinkerer
card.property: Aeronaut Tinkerer has flying as long as you control an artifact. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All tinkerers have their heads in the clouds. I don't intend to stop there."

card.name: Aetherspouts
card.property: For each attacking creature, its owner puts it on the top or bottom of their library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Don't worry, there's plenty for everyone." —Vickon, Eleventh Company battlemage

card.name: Amphin Pathmage
card.property: {2} {U}: Target creature can't be blocked this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There are those who do not believe in the existence of the amphin. This seems somehow to be of their own design." —Gor Muldrak, Cryptohistories

card.name: Chasm Skulker
card.property: Whenever you draw a card, put a +1/+1 counter on Chasm Skulker. When Chasm Skulker dies, create X 1/1 blue Squid creature tokens with islandwalk, where X is the number of +1/+1 counters on Chasm Skulker. (They can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

card.name: Chief Engineer
card.property: Artifact spells you cast have convoke. (Your creatures can help cast those spells. Each creature you tap while casting an artifact spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An eye for detail, a mind for numbers, a soul of clockwork.

card.name: Chronostutter
card.property: Put target creature into its owner's library second from the top.

card.name: Coral Barrier
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) When Coral Barrier enters the battlefield, create a 1/1 blue Squid creature token with islandwalk. (It can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.)

card.name: Diffusion Sliver
card.property: Whenever a Sliver creature you control becomes the target of a spell or ability an opponent controls, counter that spell or ability unless its controller pays {2}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The hive shimmered, and its walls seemed a living mirror." —Hastric, Thunian scout

card.name: Dissipate
card.property: Counter target spell. If that spell is countered this way, exile it instead of putting it into its owner's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This abomination never belonged in our world. I'm merely setting it free." —Dierk, geistmage

card.name: Divination
card.property: Draw two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The key to unlocking this puzzle is within you." —Doriel, mentor of Mistral Isle

card.name: Encrust
card.property: Enchant artifact or creature Enchanted permanent doesn't untap during its controller's untap step and its activated abilities can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The sea blesses the tiny with the power to fell the mighty." —Talrand, sky summoner

card.name: Ensoul Artifact
card.property: Enchant artifact Enchanted artifact is a creature with base power and toughness 5/5 in addition to its other types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Too often, some self-described genius comes up with a "labor-saving device" that ends up creating far more work.

card.name: Frost Lynx
card.property: When Frost Lynx enters the battlefield, tap target creature an opponent controls. That creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It readily attacks much larger prey, knowing retaliation is impossible.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The law has its place—as a footnote in my spellbook." —Siyani, fugitive mage

card.name: Glacial Crasher
card.property: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Glacial Crasher can't attack unless there is a Mountain on the battlefield.

card.name: Hydrosurge
card.property: Target creature gets -5/-0 until end of turn.

card.name: Illusory Angel
card.property: Cast this spell only if you've cast another spell this turn. Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "In a daze, I woke and looked upon the battlefield, where I could swear my dreams were laying waste to the enemy." —Letter from a soldier

card.name: Into the Void
card.property: Return up to two target creatures to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The cathars have their swords, the inquisitors their axes. I prefer the 'diplomatic' approach." —Terhold, archmage of Drunau

card.name: Invisibility
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature can't be blocked except by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Verick held his breath. Breathing wouldn't reveal his position, but it would force him to smell the goblins.

card.name: Jace, the Living Guildpact
card.property: +1: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your graveyard. −3: Return another target nonland permanent to its owner's hand. −8: Each player shuffles their hand and graveyard into their library. You draw seven cards.

card.name: Jace's Ingenuity
card.property: Draw three cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Brute force can sometimes kick down a locked door, but knowledge is a skeleton key."

card.name: Jalira, Master Polymorphist
card.property: {2} {U}, {T}, Sacrifice another creature: Reveal cards from the top of your library until you reveal a nonlegendary creature card. Put that card onto the battlefield and the rest on the bottom of your library in a random order.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You can become anything if I just put my mind to it."

card.name: Jorubai Murk Lurker
card.property: Jorubai Murk Lurker gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Swamp. {1}{B}: Target creature gains lifelink until end of turn. (Damage dealt by the creature also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Kapsho Kitefins
card.property: Flying Whenever Kapsho Kitefins or another creature enters the battlefield under your control, tap target creature an opponent controls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It's a truly disconcerting sight to see their shadows cast upon the deck." —Captain Triff

card.name: Master of Predicaments
card.property: Flying Whenever Master of Predicaments deals combat damage to a player, choose a card in your hand. That player guesses whether the card's converted mana cost is greater than 4. If the player guessed wrong, you may cast the card without paying its mana cost.

card.name: Mercurial Pretender
card.property: You may have Mercurial Pretender enter the battlefield as a copy of a creature you control, except it has "{2}{U}{U}: Return this creature to its owner's hand."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The king went off to find himself. Imagine his terror when he succeeded.

card.name: Military Intelligence
card.property: Whenever you attack with two or more creatures, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To know the battlefield is to anticipate the enemy. To know the enemy is to anticipate victory.

card.name: Mind Sculpt
card.property: Target opponent puts the top seven cards of their library into their graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your mind was a curious mix of madness and genius. I just took away the genius." —Jace Beleren

card.name: Negate
card.property: Counter target noncreature spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Masters of the arcane savor a delicious irony. Their study of deep and complex arcana leads to such a simple end: the ability to say merely yes or no.

card.name: Nimbus of the Isles
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The people of the Sevick Isles have a unique understanding of the term "ominous clouds."

card.name: Paragon of Gathering Mists
card.property: Other blue creatures you control get +1/+1. {U}, {T}: Another target blue creature you control gains flying until end of turn.

card.name: Peel from Reality
card.property: Return target creature you control and target creature you don't control to their owners' hands.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Soulless demon, you are bound to me. Now we will both dwell in oblivion."

card.name: Polymorphist's Jest
card.property: Until end of turn, each creature target player controls loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The flies were bothering me." —Jalira, master polymorphist

card.name: Quickling
card.property: Flash (You may cast this spell any time you could cast an instant.) Flying When Quickling enters the battlefield, sacrifice it unless you return another creature you control to its owner's hand.

card.name: Research Assistant
card.property: {3} {U}, {T}: Draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are many words and phrases that can cause an experienced wizard to tremble in fear. Chief among them is "oops."

card.name: Soul of Ravnica
card.property: Flying {5}{U}{U}: Draw a card for each color among permanents you control. {5}{U}{U}, Exile Soul of Ravnica from your graveyard: Draw a card for each color among permanents you control.

card.name: Statute of Denial
card.property: Counter target spell. If you control a blue creature, draw a card, then discard a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pyrotechnic activity of any sort is strictly prohibited. It is irrelevant that today is a holiday."

card.name: Stormtide Leviathan
card.property: Islandwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls an Island.) All lands are Islands in addition to their other types. Creatures without flying or islandwalk can't attack.

card.name: Turn to Frog
card.property: Until end of turn, target creature loses all abilities and becomes a blue Frog with base power and toughness 1/1.

card.name: Void Snare
card.property: Return target nonland permanent to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've tried so many variations on how to get rid of annoying things that it's hard to decide which one I like best." —Ashurel, voidmage

card.name: Wall of Frost
card.property: Defender Whenever Wall of Frost blocks a creature, that creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I have seen countless petty warmongers gaze on it for a time before turning away." —Sarlena, paladin of the Northern Verge

card.name: Welkin Tern
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Welkin Tern can block only creatures with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sailors have come to regard them as bad luck, for they falsely bring hope of land.

card.name: Accursed Spirit
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many have heard the slither of dragging armor and the soft squelch of its voice. But only its victims ever meet its icy gaze.

card.name: Black Cat
card.property: When Black Cat dies, target opponent discards a card at random.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its last life is spent tormenting your dreams.

card.name: Blood Host
card.property: {1} {B}, Sacrifice another creature: Put a +1/+1 counter on Blood Host and you gain 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It would be ill-mannered to decline his invitation. It would be ill-advised to accept it.

card.name: Carrion Crow
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Carrion Crow enters the battlefield tapped.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: When carrion feeds on carrion, dark days approach.

card.name: Caustic Tar
card.property: Enchant land Enchanted land has "{T}: Target player loses 3 life."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A forest fire can rejuvenate the land, but the tar's vile consumption leaves the land forever ruined.

card.name: Child of Night
card.property: Lifelink

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Sins that would be too gruesome in the light of day are made more pleasing in the dark of night.

card.name: Covenant of Blood
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Covenant of Blood deals 4 damage to any target and you gain 4 life.

card.name: Crippling Blight
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -1/-1 and can't block.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Still alive? No matter. I'll leave you as a warning to others who would oppose me." —Vish Kal, Blood Arbiter

card.name: Cruel Sadist
card.property: {B}, {T}, Pay 1 life: Put a +1/+1 counter on Cruel Sadist. {2}{B}, {T}, Remove X +1/+1 counters from Cruel Sadist: It deals X damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Face of innocence. Hand of death. Designed by Edmund McMillen

card.name: Endless Obedience
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Eternal Thirst
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has lifelink and "Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, put a +1/+1 counter on this creature." (Damage dealt by a creature with lifelink also causes its controller to gain that much life.)

card.name: Feast on the Fallen
card.property: At the beginning of each upkeep, if an opponent lost life last turn, put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "As our numbers dwindle, the ranks of the dead grow ever stronger." —Thalia, Knight-Cathar

card.name: Festergloom
card.property: Nonblack creatures get -1/-1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The death of a scout can be as informative as a safe return.

card.name: Flesh to Dust
card.property: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Pain is temporary. So is life." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Gravedigger
card.property: When Gravedigger enters the battlefield, you may return target creature card from your graveyard to your hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A grave is not always for burial.

card.name: In Garruk's Wake
card.property: Destroy all creatures you don't control and all planeswalkers you don't control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Beyond pain, beyond obsession and wild despair, there lies a place of twisted power only the most tormented souls can reach.

card.name: Indulgent Tormentor
card.property: Flying At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card unless target opponent sacrifices a creature or pays 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The promise of anguish is payment enough for services rendered.

card.name: Leeching Sliver
card.property: Whenever a Sliver you control attacks, defending player loses 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Seeing one slowly devour one of my party begged the question—do they know what cruelty is?" —Hastric, Thunian scout

card.name: Liliana Vess
card.property: +1: Target player discards a card. −2: Search your library for a card, then shuffle your library and put that card on top of it. −8: Put all creature cards from all graveyards onto the battlefield under your control.

card.name: Mind Rot
card.property: Target player discards two cards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It saddens me to lose a source of inspiration. This one seemed especially promising." —Ashiok

card.name: Necrobite
card.property: Target creature gains deathtouch until end of turn. Regenerate it. (The next time that creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat. Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Necrogen Scudder
card.property: Flying When Necrogen Scudder enters the battlefield, you lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Contrary to popular belief, it's kept aloft by necrogen gas, not the screaming agony of a thousand murdered souls.

card.name: Necromancer's Assistant
card.property: When Necromancer's Assistant enters the battlefield, put the top three cards of your library into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Zombies and necromancers agree: easy access to brains is preferred.

card.name: Necromancer's Stockpile
card.property: {1} {B}, Discard a creature card: Draw a card. If the discarded card was a Zombie card, create a tapped 2/2 black Zombie creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The experiments decided to perform some research of their own.

card.name: Nightfire Giant
card.property: Nightfire Giant gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Mountain. {4}{R}: Nightfire Giant deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nightfire turns the greatest weakness of the undead into formidable strength.

card.name: Ob Nixilis, Unshackled
card.property: Flying, trample Whenever an opponent searches their library, that player sacrifices a creature and loses 10 life. Whenever another creature dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Ob Nixilis, Unshackled.

card.name: Paragon of Open Graves
card.property: Other black creatures you control get +1/+1. {2}{B}, {T}: Another target black creature you control gains deathtouch until end of turn. (Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Rotfeaster Maggot
card.property: When Rotfeaster Maggot enters the battlefield, exile target creature card from a graveyard. You gain life equal to that card's toughness.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Is it at the top of the food chain or the bottom?

card.name: Shadowcloak Vampire
card.property: Pay 2 life: Shadowcloak Vampire gains flying until end of turn. (It can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "My favorite guilty pleasure? Are there innocent ones?"

card.name: Sign in Blood
card.property: Target player draws two cards and loses 2 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Little agonies pave the way to greater power.

card.name: Soul of Innistrad
card.property: Deathtouch {3}{B}{B}: Return up to three target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand. {3}{B}{B}, Exile Soul of Innistrad from your graveyard: Return up to three target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Stab Wound
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets -2/-2. At the beginning of the upkeep of enchanted creature's controller, that player loses 2 life.

card.name: Stain the Mind
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Choose a nonland card name. Search target player's graveyard, hand, and library for any number of cards with that name and exile them. Then that player shuffles their library.

card.name: Typhoid Rats
card.property: Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Kidnappers caught in Havengul are given two choices: languish in prison or become rat catchers. The smart ones go to prison.

card.name: Ulcerate
card.property: Target creature gets -3/-3 until end of turn. You lose 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "If it were merely lethal, that would be sufficient. The art, however, is in maximizing the suffering it causes." —Liliana Vess

card.name: Unmake the Graves
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Return up to two target creature cards from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Wall of Limbs
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever you gain life, put a +1/+1 counter on Wall of Limbs. {5}{B}{B}, Sacrifice Wall of Limbs: Target player loses X life, where X is Wall of Limbs's power.

card.name: Waste Not
card.property: Whenever an opponent discards a creature card, create a 2/2 black Zombie creature token. Whenever an opponent discards a land card, add {B}{B}. Whenever an opponent discards a noncreature, nonland card, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some bog witches practice the strange art of batrachomancy, reading portents in the number, size, and color of warts on a toad's hide.

card.name: Xathrid Slyblade
card.property: Hexproof (This creature can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.) {3}{B}: Until end of turn, Xathrid Slyblade loses hexproof and gains first strike and deathtouch. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike. Any amount of damage it deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Zof Shade
card.property: {2} {B}: Zof Shade gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Shades are drawn to places of power, often rooting themselves in a single area to feed.

card.name: Act on Impulse
card.property: Exile the top three cards of your library. Until end of turn, you may play cards exiled this way. (If you cast a spell this way, you still pay its costs. You can play a land this way only if you have an available land play remaining.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You don't want to know what happens after I put on the goggles."

card.name: Aggressive Mining
card.property: You can't play lands. Sacrifice a land: Draw two cards. Activate this ability only once each turn.

card.name: Altac Bloodseeker
card.property: Whenever a creature an opponent controls dies, Altac Bloodseeker gets +2/+0 and gains first strike and haste until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike, and it can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: Belligerent Sliver
card.property: Sliver creatures you control have menace. (They can't be blocked except by two or more creatures.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The slivers became adept at provoking a fear response in other species." —Hastric, Thunian scout

card.name: Blastfire Bolt
card.property: Blastfire Bolt deals 5 damage to target creature. Destroy all Equipment attached to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Encase yourself in the most elaborate armor, and cower behind the heaviest shield. I would hate for you to feel helpless." —Korig the Ruiner

card.name: Borderland Marauder
card.property: Whenever Borderland Marauder attacks, it gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Though she is rightly feared, there are relatively few tales of her deeds in battle, for few survive her raids.

card.name: Brood Keeper
card.property: Whenever an Aura becomes attached to Brood Keeper, create a 2/2 red Dragon creature token with flying. It has "{R}: This creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Come, little one. Unfurl your wings, fill your lungs, and release your first fiery breath."

card.name: Burning Anger
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature has "{T}: This creature deals damage equal to its power to any target."

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "With rage as your forge, your hammer can smite anything."

card.name: Chandra, Pyromaster
card.property: +1: Chandra, Pyromaster deals 1 damage to target player or planeswalker and 1 damage to up to one target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. That creature can't block this turn. 0: Exile the top card of your library. You may play it this turn. −7: Exile the top ten cards of your library. Choose an instant or sorcery card exiled this way and copy it three times. You may cast the copies without paying their mana costs.

card.name: Circle of Flame
card.property: Whenever a creature without flying attacks you or a planeswalker you control, Circle of Flame deals 1 damage to that creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Which do you think is a better deterrent: a moat of water or one of fire?" —Chandra Nalaar

card.name: Clear a Path
card.property: Destroy target creature with defender.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Why do guards always look surprised when we bash them?" asked Ruric. "I think they expect a bribe," said Thar.

card.name: Cone of Flame
card.property: Cone of Flame deals 1 damage to any target, 2 damage to another target, and 3 damage to a third target.

card.name: Crowd's Favor
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Target creature gets +1/+0 and gains first strike until end of turn. (It deals combat damage before creatures without first strike.)

card.name: Crucible of Fire
card.property: Dragon creatures you control get +3/+3.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The dragon is a perfect marriage of power and the will to use it." —Sarkhan Vol

card.name: Forge Devil
card.property: When Forge Devil enters the battlefield, it deals 1 damage to target creature and 1 damage to you.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A bit of pain never hurts.

card.name: Foundry Street Denizen
card.property: Whenever another red creature enters the battlefield under your control, Foundry Street Denizen gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: After the Foundry Street riot, Arrester Hulbein tried to ban bludgeons. Which, inevitably, resulted in another riot.

card.name: Frenzied Goblin
card.property: Whenever Frenzied Goblin attacks, you may pay {R}. If you do, target creature can't block this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What he lacks in stature, he makes up for with enthusiasm.

card.name: Generator Servant
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Generator Servant: Add {C}{C}. If that mana is spent on a creature spell, it gains haste until end of turn. (That creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

card.name: Goblin Kaboomist
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, create a colorless artifact token named Land Mine with "{R}, Sacrifice this artifact: This artifact deals 2 damage to target attacking creature without flying." Then flip a coin. If you lose the flip, Goblin Kaboomist deals 2 damage to itself.

card.name: Goblin Rabblemaster
card.property: Other Goblin creatures you control attack each combat if able. At the beginning of combat on your turn, create a 1/1 red Goblin creature token with haste. Whenever Goblin Rabblemaster attacks, it gets +1/+0 until end of turn for each other attacking Goblin.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Astride the bucking creature, Gribble hurtled down the mountainside while his Grotag brethren cheered. It was at that moment that the legend of the Skrill Tamer was born.

card.name: Hammerhand
card.property: Enchant creature When Hammerhand enters the battlefield, target creature can't block this turn. Enchanted creature gets +1/+1 and has haste. (It can attack and {T} no matter when it came under your control.)

card.name: Heat Ray
card.property: Heat Ray deals X damage to target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "There was clearly a scream. I'm not sure if there was a mouth." —Sachir, Akoum Expeditionary House

card.name: Hoarding Dragon
card.property: Flying When Hoarding Dragon enters the battlefield, you may search your library for an artifact card, exile it, then shuffle your library. When Hoarding Dragon dies, you may put the exiled card into its owner's hand.

card.name: Inferno Fist
card.property: Enchant creature you control Enchanted creature gets +2/+0. {R}, Sacrifice Inferno Fist: Inferno Fist deals 2 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "I've never been above throwing the first punch."

card.name: Kird Chieftain
card.property: Kird Chieftain gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Forest. {4}{G}: Target creature gets +2/+2 and gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Krenko's Enforcer
card.property: Intimidate (This creature can't be blocked except by artifact creatures and/or creatures that share a color with it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: He just likes to break legs. Collecting the debt is a bonus.

card.name: Kurkesh, Onakke Ancient
card.property: Whenever you activate an ability of an artifact, if it isn't a mana ability, you may pay {R}. If you do, copy that ability. You may choose new targets for the copy.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Onakke were masters of dark arts and artifice. Their creations continue to spread foul magic, paving the way for their return.

card.name: Lava Axe
card.property: Lava Axe deals 5 damage to target player or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A strict upgrade over the cinder hatchet.

card.name: Lightning Strike
card.property: Lightning Strike deals 3 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To wield lightning is to tame chaos.

card.name: Might Makes Right
card.property: At the beginning of combat on your turn, if you control each creature on the battlefield with the greatest power, gain control of target creature an opponent controls until end of turn. Untap that creature. It gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: An oath of fealty sworn with a handshake.

card.name: Miner's Bane
card.property: {2} {R}: Miner's Bane gets +1/+0 and gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There are certain stones even dwarves know to leave in the earth.

card.name: Paragon of Fierce Defiance
card.property: Other red creatures you control get +1/+1. {R}, {T}: Another target red creature you control gains haste until end of turn. (It can attack and {T} this turn.)

card.name: Rummaging Goblin
card.property: {T}, Discard a card: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: To a goblin, value is based on the four S's: shiny, stabby, smelly, and super smelly.

card.name: Scrapyard Mongrel
card.property: As long as you control an artifact, Scrapyard Mongrel gets +2/+0 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Shrapnel Blast
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice an artifact. Shrapnel Blast deals 5 damage to any target.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It requires immense pressure to imbue an item with magic. If the spell is broken . . .

card.name: Siege Dragon
card.property: Flying When Siege Dragon enters the battlefield, destroy all Walls your opponents control. Whenever Siege Dragon attacks, if defending player controls no Walls, it deals 2 damage to each creature without flying that player controls.

card.name: Soul of Shandalar
card.property: First strike {3}{R}{R}: Soul of Shandalar deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker and 3 damage to up to one target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls. {3}{R}{R}, Exile Soul of Shandalar from your graveyard: Soul of Shandalar deals 3 damage to target player or planeswalker and 3 damage to up to one target creature that player or that planeswalker's controller controls.

card.name: Stoke the Flames
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Stoke the Flames deals 4 damage to any target.

card.name: Thundering Giant
card.property: Haste (This creature can attack and {T} as soon as it comes under your control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The giant was felt a few seconds before he was seen.

card.name: Torch Fiend
card.property: {R}, Sacrifice Torch Fiend: Destroy target artifact.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Devils redecorate every room with fire.

card.name: Wall of Fire
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {R}: Wall of Fire gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mercy is for those who keep their distance.

card.name: Ancient Silverback
card.property: {G}: Regenerate Ancient Silverback. (The next time this creature would be destroyed this turn, it isn't. Instead tap it, remove all damage from it, and remove it from combat.)

card.name: Back to Nature
card.property: Destroy all enchantments.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: There will always be those who presume to improve nature, or dare to befoul it. And nature will always have a response.

card.name: Carnivorous Moss-Beast

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Ranger wisdom dictates that when fleeing from a moss-beast, you must stay calm, find your bearings, and run south.

card.name: Charging Rhino
card.property: Charging Rhino can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The knights of Troinir Keep took the rhino as their emblem due to its intense focus when charging down a perceived threat—a trait they discovered on a hunting excursion.

card.name: Chord of Calling
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost X or less and put it onto the battlefield. Then shuffle your library.

card.name: Elvish Mystic
card.property: {T}: Add {G}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life grows everywhere. My kin merely find those places where it grows strongest." —Nissa Revane

card.name: Feral Incarnation
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Create three 3/3 green Beast creature tokens.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Nature is itself wild—in all its forms.

card.name: Gather Courage
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Target creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn.

card.name: Genesis Hydra
card.property: When you cast this spell, reveal the top X cards of your library. You may put a nonland permanent card with converted mana cost X or less from among them onto the battlefield. Then shuffle the rest into your library. Genesis Hydra enters the battlefield with X +1/+1 counters on it.

card.name: Hornet Nest
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) Whenever Hornet Nest is dealt damage, create that many 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

card.name: Hornet Queen
card.property: Flying Deathtouch (Any amount of damage this deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.) When Hornet Queen enters the battlefield, create four 1/1 green Insect creature tokens with flying and deathtouch.

card.name: Hunt the Weak
card.property: Put a +1/+1 counter on target creature you control. Then that creature fights target creature you don't control. (Each deals damage equal to its power to the other.)

card.name: Hunter's Ambush
card.property: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt by nongreen creatures this turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: First you lose your enemy's trail. Then you lose all sense of direction. Then you hear the growls . . .

card.name: Invasive Species
card.property: When Invasive Species enters the battlefield, return another permanent you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It's easier to relocate a village that lies in their path than to turn the bugs aside.

card.name: Kalonian Twingrove
card.property: Kalonian Twingrove's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control. When Kalonian Twingrove enters the battlefield, create a green Treefolk Warrior creature token with "This creature's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Forests you control."

card.name: Life's Legacy
card.property: As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature. Draw cards equal to the sacrificed creature's power.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: At the instant of death, the mystery of life.

card.name: Living Totem
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) When Living Totem enters the battlefield, you may put a +1/+1 counter on another target creature.

card.name: Naturalize
card.property: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "When your cities and trinkets crumble, only nature will remain." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Netcaster Spider
card.property: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.) Whenever Netcaster Spider blocks a creature with flying, Netcaster Spider gets +2/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It is an expert at culling individuals who stray too far from the herd.

card.name: Nissa, Worldwaker
card.property: +1: Target land you control becomes a 4/4 Elemental creature with trample. It's still a land. +1: Untap up to four target Forests. −7: Search your library for any number of basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library. Those lands become 4/4 Elemental creatures with trample. They're still lands.

card.name: Nissa's Expedition
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Search your library for up to two basic land cards, put them onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Overwhelm
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Creatures you control get +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Conclave acts with a single will, expressed by countless warriors.

card.name: Paragon of Eternal Wilds
card.property: Other green creatures you control get +1/+1. {G}, {T}: Another target green creature you control gains trample until end of turn. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Phytotitan
card.property: When Phytotitan dies, return it to the battlefield tapped under its owner's control at the beginning of their next upkeep.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its root system spans the entire floor of the jungle, making eradication impossible.

card.name: Plummet
card.property: Destroy target creature with flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Let nothing own the skies but the wind." —Dejara, Giltwood druid

card.name: Ranger's Guile
card.property: Target creature you control gets +1/+1 and gains hexproof until end of turn. (It can't be the target of spells or abilities your opponents control.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "You don't survive in the wild by standing in plain sight." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Reclamation Sage
card.property: When Reclamation Sage enters the battlefield, you may destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What was once formed by masons, shaped by smiths, or given life by mages, I will return to the embrace of the earth."

card.name: Restock
card.property: Return two target cards from your graveyard to your hand. Exile Restock.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: What looked like a retreat was actually a replenishing.

card.name: Roaring Primadox
card.property: At the beginning of your upkeep, return a creature you control to its owner's hand.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "They're easy enough to find. Question is, are you sure you want to find one?" —Juruk, Kalonian tracker

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The magic of the elves leaves its mark on the forest. The magic of the forest leaves its mark on the animals who live there. The animals of the forest leave their mark on all who trespass.

card.name: Satyr Wayfinder
card.property: When Satyr Wayfinder enters the battlefield, reveal the top four cards of your library. You may put a land card from among them into your hand. Put the rest into your graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first satyr to wake after a revel must search for the site of the next one.

card.name: Shaman of Spring
card.property: When Shaman of Spring enters the battlefield, draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Some shamanic sects advocate the different seasons, each working to preserve nature's cycles.

card.name: Siege Wurm
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

card.name: Soul of Zendikar
card.property: Reach {3}{G}{G}: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token. {3}{G}{G}, Exile Soul of Zendikar from your graveyard: Create a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Sunblade Elf
card.property: Sunblade Elf gets +1/+1 as long as you control a Plains. {4}{W}: Creatures you control get +1/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We patrol the steppes to keep enemies from the forest verge."

card.name: Titanic Growth
card.property: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The massive dominate through might. The tiny survive with guile. Beware the tiny who become massive.

card.name: Undergrowth Scavenger
card.property: Undergrowth Scavenger enters the battlefield with a number of +1/+1 counters on it equal to the number of creature cards in all graveyards.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: It sees a rotting carcass as a good wine which has been aged properly.

card.name: Venom Sliver
card.property: Sliver creatures you control have deathtouch. (Any amount of damage a creature with deathtouch deals to a creature is enough to destroy it.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "We attacked with arrows dipped in poison. The slivers that did not die began to change." —Hastric, Thunian scout

card.name: Verdant Haven
card.property: Enchant land When Verdant Haven enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. Whenever enchanted land is tapped for mana, its controller adds an additional one mana of any color.

card.name: Vineweft
card.property: Enchant creature Enchanted creature gets +1/+1. {4}{G}: Return Vineweft from your graveyard to your hand.

card.name: Wall of Mulch
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {G}, Sacrifice a Wall: Draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Mulch is the fabric of life in the forest. Plants live in it, they die in it, and then they become part of it, feeding countless generations to come.

card.name: Yisan, the Wanderer Bard
card.property: {2} {G}, {T}, Put a verse counter on Yisan, the Wanderer Bard: Search your library for a creature card with converted mana cost equal to the number of verse counters on Yisan, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle your library.

card.name: Garruk, Apex Predator
card.property: +1: Destroy another target planeswalker. +1: Create a 3/3 black Beast creature token with deathtouch. −3: Destroy target creature. You gain life equal to its toughness. −8: Target opponent gets an emblem with "Whenever a creature attacks you, it gets +5/+5 and gains trample until end of turn."

card.name: Sliver Hivelord

property.name: Color
property.value: Multicolor White Blue Black Red Green

card.property: Sliver creatures you control have indestructible. (Damage and effects that say "destroy" don't destroy them.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "This is the source, the line unbroken since the calamity that brought such monsters to our shores." —Hastric, Thunian scout

card.name: Avarice Amulet
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+0 and has vigilance and "At the beginning of your upkeep, draw a card." Whenever equipped creature dies, target opponent gains control of Avarice Amulet. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Brawler's Plate
card.property: Equipped creature gets +2/+2 and has trample. (It can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.) Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Champion stood alone between the horde of the Returned and the shrine to Karametra, cutting down scores among hundreds. She would have been overcome if not for the aid of the temple guardians whom Karametra awakened. —The Theriad

card.name: The Chain Veil
card.property: At the beginning of your end step, if you didn't activate a loyalty ability of a planeswalker this turn, you lose 2 life. {4}, {T}: For each planeswalker you control, you may activate one of its loyalty abilities once this turn as though none of its loyalty abilities have been activated this turn.

card.name: Gargoyle Sentinel
card.property: Defender (This creature can't attack.) {3}: Until end of turn, Gargoyle Sentinel loses defender and gains flying.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The beating of a gargoyle's wings on the air is like the cracking of stones. Intruders who rouse a gargoyle are certain to hear the cracking of bones.

card.name: Grindclock
card.property: {T}: Put a charge counter on Grindclock. {T}: Target player puts the top X cards of their library into their graveyard, where X is the number of charge counters on Grindclock.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Pray you never hear it chime.

card.name: Haunted Plate Mail
card.property: Equipped creature gets +4/+4. {0}: Until end of turn, Haunted Plate Mail becomes a 4/4 Spirit artifact creature that's no longer an Equipment. Activate this ability only if you control no creatures. Equip {4} ({4}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Hot Soup
card.property: Equipped creature can't be blocked. Whenever equipped creature is dealt damage, destroy it. Equip {3} ({3}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Juggernaut
card.property: Juggernaut attacks each combat if able. Juggernaut can't be blocked by Walls.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Many a besieged city has surrendered upon hearing the distinctive rumble of the juggernaut.

card.name: Meteorite
card.property: When Meteorite enters the battlefield, it deals 2 damage to any target. {T}: Add one mana of any color.

card.name: Obelisk of Urd
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.) As Obelisk of Urd enters the battlefield, choose a creature type. Creatures you control of the chosen type get +2/+2.

card.name: Ornithopter
card.property: Flying

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Once a year, the skies over Paliano fill with the flying machines of those who hope to be taken on as pupils by the artificer Muzzio.

card.name: Perilous Vault
card.property: {5}, {T}, Exile Perilous Vault: Exile all nonland permanents.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The spirit dragon Ugin arranged the hedrons of Zendikar to direct leylines of energy. To disrupt one is to unleash devastation and chaos.

card.name: Phyrexian Revoker
card.property: As Phyrexian Revoker enters the battlefield, choose a nonland card name. Activated abilities of sources with the chosen name can't be activated.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "To be in the presence of a revoker is to be truly alone." —Kara Vrist, Neurok agent

card.name: Profane Memento
card.property: Whenever a creature card is put into an opponent's graveyard from anywhere, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "An angel's skull is left too plain by death. I made a few aesthetic modifications." —Dommique, blood artist

card.name: Rogue's Gloves
card.property: Whenever equipped creature deals combat damage to a player, you may draw a card. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

card.name: Sacred Armory
card.property: {2}: Target creature gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Arrive for worship. Leave for war.

card.name: Scuttling Doom Engine
card.property: Scuttling Doom Engine can't be blocked by creatures with power 2 or less. When Scuttling Doom Engine dies, it deals 6 damage to target opponent or planeswalker.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A masterwork of spite, inspired by madness.

card.name: Shield of the Avatar
card.property: If a source would deal damage to equipped creature, prevent X of that damage, where X is the number of creatures you control. Equip {2} ({2}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: We are made stronger by those we fight for. Designed by Richard Garriott

card.name: Soul of New Phyrexia
card.property: Trample {5}: Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn. {5}, Exile Soul of New Phyrexia from your graveyard: Permanents you control gain indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Staff of the Death Magus
card.property: Whenever you cast a black spell or a Swamp enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of ambition in ruthless times.

card.name: Staff of the Flame Magus
card.property: Whenever you cast a red spell or a Mountain enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of passion in indifferent times.

card.name: Staff of the Mind Magus
card.property: Whenever you cast a blue spell or an Island enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of sagacity in bewildering times.

card.name: Staff of the Sun Magus
card.property: Whenever you cast a white spell or a Plains enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of conviction in uncertain times.

card.name: Staff of the Wild Magus
card.property: Whenever you cast a green spell or a Forest enters the battlefield under your control, you gain 1 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: A symbol of ferocity in oppressive times.

card.name: Tormod's Crypt
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Tormod's Crypt: Exile all cards from target player's graveyard.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Dominaria's most extravagant crypt nevertheless holds an empty grave.

card.name: Tyrant's Machine
card.property: {4}, {T}: Tap target creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Though tempered differently, all wills can be broken." —Inquisitor Kyrik

card.name: Will-Forged Golem
card.property: Convoke (Your creatures can help cast this spell. Each creature you tap while casting this spell pays for {1} or one mana of that creature's color.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The modular nature of the automaton's design makes assembly perfectly intuitive.

card.name: Battlefield Forge
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {R} or {W}. Battlefield Forge deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Caves of Koilos
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {W} or {B}. Caves of Koilos deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Darksteel Citadel
card.property: Indestructible {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Structures built from darksteel yield to neither assault nor age.

card.name: Evolving Wilds
card.property: {T}, Sacrifice Evolving Wilds: Search your library for a basic land card, put it onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle your library.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Without the interfering hands of civilization, nature will always shape itself to its own needs.

card.name: Llanowar Wastes
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {B} or {G}. Llanowar Wastes deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Radiant Fountain
card.property: When Radiant Fountain enters the battlefield, you gain 2 life. {T}: Add {C}.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "All peoples treasure a place where the weary traveler may drink in peace." —Ajani Goldmane

card.name: Shivan Reef
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {U} or {R}. Shivan Reef deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Sliver Hive
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add one mana of any color. Spend this mana only to cast a Sliver spell. {5}, {T}: Create a 1/1 colorless Sliver creature token. Activate this ability only if you control a Sliver.

card.name: Urborg, Tomb of Yawgmoth
card.property: Each land is a Swamp in addition to its other land types.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Yawgmoth's corpse is a wound in the universe. His foul blood seeps out, infecting the land with his final curse." —Lord Windgrace

card.name: Yavimaya Coast
card.property: {T}: Add {C}. {T}: Add {G} or {U}. Yavimaya Coast deals 1 damage to you.

card.name: Aegis Angel
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) When Aegis Angel enters the battlefield, another target permanent gains indestructible for as long as you control Aegis Angel. (Effects that say "destroy" don't destroy it. A creature with indestructible can't be destroyed by damage.)

card.name: Divine Verdict
card.property: Destroy target attacking or blocking creature.

card.name: Inspired Charge
card.property: Creatures you control get +2/+1 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Impossible! How could they overwhelm us? We had barricades, war elephants, . . . and they were barely a tenth of our number!" —General Avitora

card.name: Serra Angel
card.property: Flying, vigilance

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Follow the light. In its absence, follow her.

card.name: Cancel
card.property: Counter target spell.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "What you are attempting is not against the law. It is, however, extremely foolish."

card.name: Mahamoti Djinn
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Of royal blood among the spirits of the air, the Mahamoti djinn rides on the wings of the winds. As dangerous in the gambling hall as he is in battle, he is a master of trickery and misdirection.

card.name: Nightmare
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Nightmare's power and toughness are each equal to the number of Swamps you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The thunder of its hooves beats dreams into despair.

card.name: Sengir Vampire
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) Whenever a creature dealt damage by Sengir Vampire this turn dies, put a +1/+1 counter on Sengir Vampire.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Empires rise and fall, but evil is eternal.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Feeding a normal army is a problem of logistics. With zombies, it is an asset. Feeding is why they fight. Feeding is why they are feared." —Jadar, ghoulcaller of Nephalia

card.name: Furnace Whelp
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Furnace Whelp gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Baby dragons can't figure out humans—if they didn't want to be killed, why were they made of meat and treasure?

card.name: Seismic Strike
card.property: Seismic Strike deals damage to target creature equal to the number of Mountains you control.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Life up here is simple. Adapt to the ways of the mountains and they will reward you. Fight them and they will end you." —Kezim, prodigal pyromancer

card.name: Shivan Dragon
card.property: Flying (This creature can't be blocked except by creatures with flying or reach.) {R}: Shivan Dragon gets +1/+0 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The undisputed master of the mountains of Shiv.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "The centaurs are truly free. Never will they be tamed by temptation or controlled by fear. They live in total harmony, a feat not yet achieved by our kind."—Ramal, sage of Westgate

card.name: Garruk's Packleader
card.property: Whenever another creature with power 3 or greater enters the battlefield under your control, you may draw a card.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "He has learned much in his long years. And unlike selfish humans, he's willing to share." —Garruk Wildspeaker

card.name: Terra Stomper
card.property: This spell can't be countered. Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Its footfalls cause violent earthquakes, hurtling boulders, and unseasonable dust storms.
